channel.title: CVE Feed for thimpress -- LearnPress – WordPress LMS Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for thimpress -- LearnPress – WordPress LMS Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-2115|2024-04-05T07:34:35.847Z -- thimpress -- learnpress%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20lms%20plugin
item.description: The LearnPress – WordPress LMS Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.0. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the filter_users functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to elevate their privileges to that of a teacher via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-5483|2024-06-05T02:34:31.183Z -- thimpress -- learnpress%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20lms%20plugin
item.description: The LearnPress – WordPress LMS Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 4.2.6.8 due to incorrect implementation of get_items_permissions_check function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract basic information about website users, including their emails
